'''The Chasm Mining Records''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete the hidden exploration objective [[Find The Chasm Mining Records]] by reading all three text fragments related to mining in [[The Chasm]].
